sqlMap.statement: SELECT INF.MENU_INFO_PK ,INF.MENU_INFO_TXT ,INF.MENU_INFO_VWBLE_FLG ,INF.MENU_EFF_FROM_DT ,INF.MENU_EFF_FROM_TM ,INF.MENU_EFF_THRU_DT ,INF.MENU_EFF_THRU_TM ,INF.MENU_INFO_SORT_NUM ,INF.EZUPTIME ,INF.EZUPTIMEZONE FROM MENU_INFO INF WHERE INF.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND INF.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY INF.MENU_INFO_SORT_NUM ,INF.MENU_EFF_FROM_DT DESC ,INF.MENU_INFO_PK DESC

SELECT INF.MENU_INFO_TXT FROM MENU_INFO INF WHERE INF.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND COALESCE(INF.MENU_EFF_FROM_DT,' ') || COALESCE(INF.MENU_EFF_FROM_TM,' ') <= #NOW_DT# || #NOW_TM# AND COALESCE(INF.MENU_EFF_THRU_DT,'99999999') || COALESCE(INF.MENU_EFF_THRU_TM,'999999') >= #NOW_DT# || #NOW_TM# AND INF.MENU_INFO_VWBLE_FLG = 'Y' AND INF.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY INF.MENU_INFO_SORT_NUM ,INF.MENU_EFF_FROM_DT DESC ,INF.MENU_INFO_PK DESC
